sentences.sentence: There were icicles hanging from the eaves.
The rain water drips from the eaves.
Because of the typhoons that batter Japan in the summer, Japanese builders learned to extend the eaves of buildings further beyond the walls.
sentences.translation: 由于夏季袭击日本的台风，日本的建筑工人学会了将建筑物的屋檐延伸到墙外更远的地方。
